songs.lyrics: Produced byRelease Date“Easy On Me” marks Adele’s return after a six-year hiatus. The song is the lead single off her fourth studio album 30. In an October 2021 BBC Radio 1 interview, Adele revealed that it was the first song written for the album, as she started it back in 2019. The song sees the singer speak about her fraught childhood, her lost marriage and the lessons learnt and unlearnt about family, love and abandonment along the way.Following recent teases of her long-awaited fourth album on October 5, 2021, Adele took to Twitter, announcing that she would be dropping a brand new song on October 15th, sharing the teaser trailer to this track. The first verse of the song was played during Adele’s Instagram Live on October 9, 2021.Upon its release, “Easy On Me” broke the world record for the most streamed song in 24 hours, with 24 million streams. This demolished the previously held record for BTS’s “Butter.”.I was making decisions in my life which have been well documented over the last few years. I definitely started some fights post my relationship with my son’s dad with other people. Normally I’m very not confrontational but you can just initiate something and be like, ‘Well hang on a minute, go easy on me.’ Just like, bear with me while I try and find my feet in a situation.There’s something that’s really hopeful about it as well as sad, I obviously bawled my eyes out when I was writing it and when I was singing it for the recording. There’s an element of hope in it which in turn gave me hope because I was at my wit’s end in the beginning of 2019.According to Billboard, “Easy on Me” debuted at #68 on the Billboard Hot 100 the week ending October 22, 2021, based on its first five hours of availability. The song peaked at #1 during the next chart week. It is her fifth song to top the Hot 100.
Produced byRelease Date

[Nakarat]
Bebeğim, üstüme gelme
Yine de bir çocuktum
Etrafımdaki dünyayı anlama
Şansım olmadı
Yapmak istediğim şeyi yapmaya zamanım olmadı
O yüzden üstüme gelme“Easy On Me” Adele'in altı yıllık aradan sonraki geri dönüşü olma niteliğini taşıyor. Şarkı, kendisinin dördüncü stüdyo albümü olan 30‘un çıkış teklisi. Şarkıda, şarkıcının sıkıntılı çocukluğu, başarısız evliliği ve aile, aşk ve terk etme üzerine aldığı ya da almadığı derslerden bahsettiğini görüyoruz.5 Ekim 2021'de kendisinin uzun süredir beklenen dördüncü albümünün tanıtımlarını takiben Adele Twitter üzerinden “Easy On Me” şarkısının tanıtım videosunu paylaşarak 15 Ekim 2021'de yepyeni bir şarkı yayımlama ihtimali olduğunu duyurdu. Şarkının ilk bölümü Adele'in 9 Ekim 2021'deki Instagram canlı yayınında çalınmıştı.Orijinal açıklamaBuraya tıklayarak ulaşabilirsiniz.Adele, BBC Radio 1 röportajında şarkı hakkında şunları söyledi:Herkesin iyi bildiği üzere birkaç yıldır hayatıma ilişkin tercihler yapıyordum. İlişkimden sonra oğlumun babası ve başka insanlarla tartışmalar yaşadım. Aslında ben pek zıt giden biri değilimdir ama bir şey başlatıp ‘Bir saniye, üstüme gelme.’ gibi bir tepki verebilirsiniz. Yani bir duruma ayak uydurmaya çalışıyorken bana biraz sabır gösterin.Bir de umut dolu olduğu kadar üzücü olan bir şey vardı ortada ki samimiyetle söylüyorum yazarken de söylerken de gözyaşlarıma hâkim olamadım. Umut unsuru işin içindeydi ki o beni ayakta tuttu çünkü 2019'un başlarında tükenmenin eşiğindeydim."Evet, kırdı. 15 Ekim'de Adele'in Easy On Me parçası Spotify'da 24,9 milyon kez yayınlanarak bir tek günde en çok dinlenen parça oldu. Rekor daha önce BTS‘e aitti, grubun Butter parçası bir tek gün içerisinde 20,9 milyon kez dinlenmişti.

[Estribillo]

Así que ten consideración conmigo“Easy On Me” marca el regreso de Adele tras un descanso de seis años. Se espera que la canción se incluya en su próximo cuarto álbum de estudio como sencillo principal. En la canción, la cantante habla de su tensa infancia, de su matrimonio perdido y de las lecciones aprendidas y desaprendidas sobre la familia, el amor y el abandono en el camino.Tras los recientes anuncios de su esperado cuarto álbum, el 5 de octubre de 2021, Adele anunció en Twitter que lanzaría una nueva canción el 15 de octubre de 2021 y compartió el adelanto del mismo. El primer verso de la canción se escuchó durante el Instagram Live de Adele el 9 de octubre de 2021.Pincha aquí.

ดังนั้น เห็นใจกันบ้าง“Easy On Me” ทำให้ Adele กลับมาอีกครั้งหลังจากพักไป 6 ปี เพลงนี้เป็นเพลงหลักของ studio album ที่สี่ของเธอ 30 เพลงนี้พูดถึงวัยเด็กที่เต็มไปด้วยชีวิตชีวา การแต่งงานที่สูญเสียไป และบทเรียนที่ได้เรียนรู้และไม่ได้เรียนรู้เกี่ยวกับครอบครัว ความรัก และการละทิ้งตลอดเส้นทางติดตามหลังจาก เธอแซว อัลบั้มที่สี่ที่รอคอยมานานในวันที่ 5 ตุลาคม 2021 Adele โพสต์ใน Twitter ประกาศว่าเธอจะมีเพลงใหม่ล่าสุดในวันที่ 15 ตุลาคม 2021 นี้ โดยได้แชร์ตัวอย่างเพลงนี้ ท่อนแรกของเพลงที่เล่นระหว่าง Instagram Live ของ Adele ของเมื่อวันที่ 9 ตุลาคม 2021.คลิกที่นี่.

Так что пойми меня«Easy On Me» — лид-сингл с предстоящего четвёртого студийного альбома Адель «30». Является её первой песней, выпущенной за 6 лет после выхода альбома «25». В интервью BBC Radio 1 в октябре 2021 года Адель рассказала, что это была первая песня, написанная для альбома, работа над которым началась ещё в 2019 году. В песне певица рассказывает о своём нелёгком детстве, о потерянном браке, о выученных и невыученных уроках о семье и любви.5 октября 2021 года, Адель вышла в Twitter, объявив, что 15 октября она выпустит совершенно новую песню, и поделилась тизер-трейлером к этому треку.«Easy On Me» побила мировой рекорд по количеству стримов за 24 часа — 24 миллиона. Раньше этот рекорд принадлежал группе BTS с треком “Butter”.Adele – ​Easy On Me

Produced byRelease DateHere are the lyrics to my “Hotter Than Chipotle” song. Click on the highlighted lyrics to see the annotations. The beat used is “You Know We Rock It” by J Dilla. Although, Jeremy and I mixed so that it faded out towards the end.

Everything we hold will pass awayThis is the seventh track from the album Frail Words Collapse by… you already know. This song is about Tim’s struggle with his faith in God and how he perceives the world. I think TIm is becoming doubtful about God and what we hold dearly.

Immediate lethal response suggestedEnemy Undefined is the third song in Princewhateverer’s Destabilize saga. It was leaked a couple of days before release by Princewhateverer’s aggregator which adds a bit of irony, considering the Destabilize saga is based on a robot.
